items.description: Design and development of a modular and fully responsive framework for gaming applications (online slots) written in JavaScript and based on Phaser3. Developed also many games based on framework.
Backend developer/mantainer on ViMS videosurveillance software suite (Python / Django / Twisted)

Redesign and development of a framework for gaming applications (online slots) in JavaScript on Phaser3 (audio handling, win animations, reels and symbols movement, particle engines, character handling, spine animations, responsive handling) starting from an exiting custom framework based on Phaser CE. Developed game logic on games based on a custom existing framework running on Phaser CE;
Backend development on web applications ad REST APIs in JavaScript / TypeScript on NodeJS / Express and Nest.js, and on PHP / Laravel; Frontend development in HTML5/CSS3, jQuery, Vue.js, React Hooks;
Head firmware / software developer. The company deals with the design and production of hardware/software systems with applications in industrial and business sectors;

items.role: Technical teacher on school-work programs (public high schools)
items.company: Liceo Scientifico 'Severi' (Salerno) / Liceo Scientifico 'Da Vinci' (Poggiomarino - NA) / IIS 'Marconi' (Nocera Inferiore - SA)
items.description: Software development courses on Arduino and Web/Mobile Applications at the Liceo Scientifico 'Severi' (Salerno), Liceo Scientifico 'Da Vinci' (Poggiomarino - NA), and the IIS 'Marconi' (Nocera Inferiore - SA);

Owner of Startup Solutions, a company specialized in the development of technological solutions in the fields of IT, digital entertainment and industrial and civil automation. The company has developed software for mobile devices and firmware for embedded systems and microcontrollers. Roles covered: Head of Design, Research and Development, Automation, Linux, Android and Embedded Systems;

Professional collaboration with GennaGroup company in the completion of the PlayOn project (hardware/software platform for coin-op gaming); Collaborations with other companies in the technology sector;

Founding member of Emthesis Development, a multimedia and videogames development company, where I held the roles of OOP Design, Web Design/Development, Game Design, Network Programming, 2D API Programming, Mobile Gaming, software infrastructure programming and support for resource coordination and generic programming. The company has produced some budget games for PC marketed in the European Union. The company has also dealt, within the collaboration with the GennaGroup company, with the design and implementation of the Play-On Multimedia System (linux-based hardware platform for the coin-op sector and for the creation and integration in various multimedia systems);

Programmer analyst at ITSoft (ITS S.p.A. group). Projects completed: multithreaded C++ programming in Sun Solaris; Implementation of a real-time system, in C++, of a codec for video encoding/decoding in H.263 standard, subsequently integrated into a videochat system for Telecom Italia on Compaq iPaq handhelds (o.s. Microsoft PocketPC); Development of management modules in C++ in the context of e-learning systems on behalf of netStre@m (ITS group); Development of Java components in the context of the Avvocatura dello Stato Project for the client Finsiel S.p.a., in Rome;
Java development on enterprise applications based on technologies related to Enterprise Java applications, such as JavaBeans, Java Server Pages, Servlets;
Trainer of the Computer Expression Laboratory of the Time Out Day Center / Ser.T. District 76 (ASL NA 4), for the introduction to basic computer usage;

Occasional collaboration in the development of firmware on DataGeneral palmtop systems, DataGenie2 model, and of MS Windows software related to a demonstration application proposed to Alenia S.p.A.; Development of firmware on MS-DOS HIT palmtop systems and of MS Windows software related to a demonstration application proposed to Italgas S.p.A.
Experiences in game programming in AmigaOS and Windows environments, as a developer and 3D graphic designer;

Development of an hardware/software system for lighting effects systems automation for discos, in an AmigaOS environment. Development of software in MS-DOS environment and C language for the complete management of a gym (customer management, training program management, nutrition programs, etc.);

I study and update myself continuously. In recent years I have developed in-depth knowledge in various programming and scripting languages, specializing in development on GNU/Linux operating systems, on embedded and mobile systems, in the development of web-based infrastructures, as well as in the development of firmware for microcontrollers, and in technologies used in the infrastructures of game development and multimedia sector
AIFA Campania Region training course, aimed at hiring by the company ITSoft (ITS S.p.A. group). Topics covered: C, C++, Java programming, DBMS use (SQL), programming in UNIX environments.
uncompleted course of study
Computer Science Specialization

items.title: GDK Framework + Web/Mobile Games
items.description:
Design and development of a modular framework for the rapid creation of multimedia web applications, focused on online slot games, based on Phaser3. Complete and automatic management of responsive, self-adapting on any device, including mobile. Heavily configurable via JSON scripts.
Development of various games based on the framework.

items.title: TukoSlotsClient new framework + Web/Mobile games
items.description: Redesign and development of a framework for gaming applications (online slots) in JavaScript on Phaser3 (audio management, win animations, reel and symbol movement, particle engines, character management, spine animations, responsive management) starting from an existing proprietary framework based on Phaser CE. Implementation of game logics for games based on existing Phaser CE framework;

items.title: ExteMachine Controller
items.description: Control electronics for hair extensions application devices. Reimplementation of temperature control firmware (PID) on an existing board (MCU Atmega8), creation of user interfaces on touch displays both on ESP32 MCU (for 3.5") and on RaspberryPi embedded systems (for 5 and 7") displays. ESP32 version: implementation in C++ of the layout and graphic widgets (buttons, textbox, etc.); RaspberryPi version: operating system image created ad-hoc using Buildroot, UI created in Python / PyQt5.

items.title: TAG MCode Machine Controller
items.description: Intelligent hardware controller for industrial fruit and vegetable packaging machines, with stepper motor-based motion. Asynchronous motion of motors with linear accelerations/decelerations between 400 and 2000 steps/sec, with precision to the hundredth of a millimeter. Design and implementation of the machine programming language (m-code), and implementation of the interpreter in register-based virtual machine mode. MCU: STM32. Implementation of the HMI user module based on an embedded GNU/Linux system with a frontend in HTML5/websocket/vue.js. HMI <-> MCU communication via Modbus RTU protocol. Implementation of a multiplatform "code editor" software based on vue.js and NW.js

items.title: V-ITA BatteryClinic
items.description: Intelligent system for testing and reconditioning lithium batteries for pedal-assisted bicycles. Firmware design and implementation in C++ on STM32 MCU and software in Python (Flask + MQTT) and JavaScript (AngularJS) in GNU/linux embedded environment

items.title: RotoKalt
items.description: Intelligent freecooling ventilation system for industrial environments, data centers and telecommunication centers. Firmware design and implementation in C++ on STM32 MCU and software in Python (Flask + MQTT) and JavaScript (AngularJS) in GNU/linux embedded environment

items.title: Arco Aladin
items.description: Embedded control system for concentrated detergent dispensers with touchscreen display, RFID authentication, load cell management and dispensing actuators. Software in Python (Flask + MQTT) and JavaScript (AngularJS) on RaspberryPi SBC

items.title: OleoControl
items.description: Process monitoring system for oil mill, with customer queue management, processing temperature monitoring, processing report export in PDF. Firmware implementation in C++ on MCU ESP8266 and software in Python (Flask + MQTT) and JavaScript (AngularJS) on SBC RaspberryPi

items.title: Embedded system for booking management
items.description: Embedded system for booking management with touchscreen display, voice synthesis, ticket issuing via thermal printer

items.title: Utility di conversione GCode per macchina CNC taglio laser
items.description: Reverse engineering of communication protocol and implementation of standard G-Code to 'dialect' G-Code conversion utility for 250W Bulleri laser cutting machine tool (Python + wxPython)

items.title: Phlay App: GLSL Shaders
items.description: Implementation of camera management and rendering components using GLSL shaders
